aboutProject.heading: Malunga neProjekthi
aboutProject.paragraph1: ITempile ye-Orbital ngumsebenzi wobugcisa kunye nesathelayithi ejolise ekubeni yitempile ebandakanyayo, eyakhiwe apho kungekho ludonga lunokufikelela khona. Iyilwe ligcisa laseBrazil u-Edson Pavoni, igcisa elisemva kweSikhumbuzo i-Inumeráveis elifikelele kwi-1 kwaba-6 abantu baseBrazil ngexesha lobhubhani we-COVID, le projekthi imema abantu abavela kwihlabathi liphela ukuba bathumele igama lomntu abanqwenela ukumkhumbula. La magama athunyelwa kwisathelayithi kwi-orbit, edala isikhumbuzo esihlangeneyo.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Ngewebhusayithi efumaneka ngeelwimi ezingama-136, abathathi-nxaxheba babandakanyeka kuhlobo olutsha lwesiko. ITempile ye-Orbital iphonononga imixholo yokubandakanywa, inkumbulo, kunye nobuntu bethu ekwabelwana ngabo, sibuza ukuba kutheni kungekho tempile yasemzimbeni eMhlabeni enokwamkela wonke umntu ngokwenyani, kwaye iphakamisa indawo njengendawo ekukuphela kwayo apho ubandakanyo lunokubakho.

aboutArtist.heading: Malunga noMzobi
aboutArtist.paragraph1: U-Edson Pavoni ligcisa laseBrazil uhambo lwakhe lwaqala kwizitrato zaseSão Paulo, apho imeko yentlupheko kunye nobundlobongela yabumba iminyaka yakhe yokuqala. Kwilizwe apho ubuKristu bunikela indlela ekude nezitrato, iziyobisi nogonyamelo, uPavoni wafumana ikhusi elukholweni, umxholo owawuya kuthi kamva, xa waba ngumgxeki wokuxhatshazwa konqulo, abonise uqheliselo lwakhe lobugcisa.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Ngo-2020, ngexesha lobhubhani we-COVID-19, uPavoni wenza i-Inumeráveis (engenakubalwa) , umsebenzi wobugcisa ekudibaneni kobugcisa kunye nobuntatheli. Le projekthi yenza udliwano-ndlebe namawaka eentsapho kwaye yabhala amabali abo baphulukene nobhubhane, idala indawo apho inkumbulo idlula amanani kunye namanani. Imibongo, iingoma kunye neesimphoni zenziwa ngaloo mabali. Amaphephandaba enza amaqweqwe esebenzisa amagama neembali. Zonke iinkwenkwezi zaseBrazil ezifana no-Oscar ophumeleleyo uFernanda Torres, kunye neenkwenkwezi ezifana noSelton Melo, u-Eva Wilma, uCamila Pitanga, uDebora Secco, uTais Araujo noLazaro Ramos, kunye nabanye abaninzi bafunda loo mabali kumabonwakude kazwelonke. Le projekthi ifikelele kubantu abazizigidi ezingama-32, umntu omnye kwabane baseBrazil. Yaba luthungelwano lokuphilisa, isikhumbuzo esidityanelweyo kwinkumbulo.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Emva kweencoko ezingaphezu kwamawaka alishumi ngentlungu, kwavela umzekelo: xa sithetha ngomntu ofileyo, sikhetha iziqwenga zebali labo ngokungathi sibhalela umlindi wesango leparadesi ileta. Senza konke okusemandleni ethu ukubathumela koko sikholelwa ukuba lizulu. Lo msebenzi ubangele ukuqonda okutsha: Iinkolelo zethu malunga nokuba ngubani ofanelwe yizulu zibumba ngokuthe ngqo ukuba simamkele okanye singabandakanyi eMhlabeni. Amakoloniyali angamaPhuthukezi eBrazil ayekholelwa ukuba abantu abaMnyama babengenayo imiphefumlo; loo nkolelo yayibuthethelela ubukhoboka. Ukuba wawungowomthonyama, ukuba wazalelwa kwindawo engalunganga okanye umthanda umntu ongalunganga, kusaxelelwa ukuba iingcango zezulu zivaliwe kuwe unanamhla. Ngaba kukho umbono wekamva ongazaliswanga kukugatywa?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Yazalwa ngaloo ndlela ke iTempile yeOrbital.

team.content: Itempile ye-Orbital idalwe ngokubambisana noSathi Roy, uPedro Kaled, uJoão Pedro Polito, uVictor Baptista, uJoão Victor Alves, uAndré Biagioni, uVK, uJonathan Querubina, uGuilherme Bullejos, uEduardo Dias, uRoberta Savian Rosa, uClara Marques, uDaphne Alves, uFlavio Pedro Vidigal Vigal Putti, Rafael Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, nabo bonke abo baqhubeka nokucebisa amagama ale tempile.

pressCoverage.heading: Ibonakaliswe ngaphakathi / Cinezela uFundo
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Inkcazo yeendaba kunye neempawu ziya kongezwa njengoko zifumaneka. Ngohlaziyo lwamva nje, nceda uqhagamshelane neqela lethu leendaba.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Imiboniso yangaphambili kunye neempawu ziquka iintetho kwi-13th Mercosul Bienal, ukuqatshelwa kwi-Lumen Prize, kunye nokukhethwa yi-Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
